item.title: AI vs Identity Threats: How Microsoft Entra Is Making You More Secure
item.description: Microsoft Entra now integrates Security Copilot, providing identity teams with AI-powered support for troubleshooting, investigating risks, and optimizing Conditional Access. The new Conditional Access Optimization Agent (CAOA) offers targeted recommendations and one-click fixes, streamlining protection tasks. This article gives a practical overview of these updates, including their functions and adoption strategies for your organization.
